title: Transparency Report 2025
summary: Annual transparency report showcasing our financial operations and organizational updates.

adminUpdates.title: Incorporation
adminUpdates.description: Argot has completed its incorporation process. Corporate registry information is available for reference, reflecting the organization's legal structure and jurisdiction.

adminUpdates.title: Rolling over contracts from EF to Argot
adminUpdates.description: All relevant contracts have been transitioned from EF to Argot to ensure continuity of work, clear ownership, and aligned operational responsibility.
